text: Lilian Ridgewell (19 October 1912 - July 1997) was a British gymnast. She competed in the women's artistic team all-around event at the 1936 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1912 births Category:1997 deaths Category:British female artistic gymnasts Category:Olympic gymnasts of Great Britain Category:Gymnasts at the 1936 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from London
title: Lilian Ridgewell
